desc: Optimizes the module. Also accepts the optimize level:
-O2s  Specifies optimize level 2 with shrink level 1

optimizeLevel.desc: How much to focus on optimizing code.

shrinkLevel.desc: How much to focus on shrinking code size.

outFile.desc: Specifies the output file. Format is determined by file extension.

binaryFile.desc: Specifies the binary format output file (.wasm).

textFile.desc: Specifies the text format output file (.wast).

asmjsFile.desc: Specifies the asm.js format output file (.js).

noLib.desc: Does not include the standard library.

noMemory.desc: Does not set up a memory.

desc: Sets the trap mode to use.
allow  Allow trapping operations. This is the default.
clamp  Replace trapping operations with clamping semantics.
js     Replace trapping operations with JS semantics.

runPasses.desc: Specifies additional Binaryen passes to run.
